item.title: Republican Rep. Doug LaMalfa dies at 65, GOP says
item.description: LaMalfa's death is a critical shift in the balance of power in the U.S. House of Representatives, tightening Republicans' razor-thin majority.

item.title: Rubio explains how U.S. might 'run' Venezuela after Maduro's ouster
item.description: President Donald Trump on Saturday said the U.S. will "run" Venezuela until a new leader is determined.

item.title: Trump wants to take over Greenland — but the island's economy faces ‘major challenges’
item.description: Danish officials warned Tuesday that Greenland’s economy faces a series of obstacles in 2026 and beyond.

item.title: 'Greenland belongs to its people': European leaders unite over Trump’s threats to annex territory
item.description: European leaders on Tuesday issued a joint statement to push back against U.S. President Donald Trump's renewed interest in Greenland.

item.title: Classified Venezuela briefing leaves lawmakers split along party lines after Maduro capture
item.description: Senate Democrats are moving to force a vote on a measure to block further military action in Venezuela.
